subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Off topic but LOL
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Yep I know she was funny he was terrifying. I aint gettin on it, I told her that when she gave me tickets but I got them for the girls at work they love that junk LOL

Misty

> roller coaster
> ride style lockdown.
